metadata.scenario: E-commerce product recommendations based on category

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I'm looking for a new pair of running shoes. Can you recommend some? I'm really overwhelmed by all the choices!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! To give you the best recommendations, could you tell me what kind of running you typically do? (e.g., road, trail, distance), your budget, and any specific brands or features you prefer? Also, what is your typical shoe size?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I mostly run on roads, usually about 5-10k at a time, and my budget is around $150. I have a wide foot and I've always liked the feel of Asics, but I'm open to other brands. My shoe size is US 10. Now, how can you give me recommendations that would satisfy my needs based on all the options available, specifically when there are so many new releases constantly?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Based on your preferences, I can recommend the Asics Gel-Kayano 29, which is designed for road running and offers good stability. It's usually within your budget. Alternatively, the Brooks Ghost 15 is another popular option with good cushioning for road running and comes in wide sizes. To address the new releases, I will also factor in the latest models based on your needs and preferences as they become available and notify you accordingly. I've found a few different models from the recommended brand and size that are available in stock right now. Would you like to see them?
